name: Grandma's Boi
description:
Grandma's sick and you are the only hope to take her to the hospital.

Run around the city trying to avoid the crazy horny grandpas and the angry kids, and get to the hospital as soon as possible before she DIES!

Some basic controls:

WASD - move

Scroll - Zoom In/Out

LMB-Attack

E-Pick Grandma Up
